snippet: Austerity programs were likely to be scrutinized in light of the data, which pointed toward a recession continuing well into next year.
abstract: Eurostat reports that euro zone gross domestic product fell by 0.1 in the most recent quarter, the fourth consecutive period in which there was no growth or decline; austerity programs will likely be scrutinized following the shrinkage, which leaves no doubt that the region is in recession and signals that long road to recovery remains.
lead_paragraph: Austerity programs were likely to be scrutinized in light of the data, which pointed toward a recession continuing well into next year.

headline.seo: Euro Zone Recession Is Reinforced by Second Quarter of Economic Decline
headline.main: Euro Zone Recession Is Reinforced by Slump in a Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Euro Zone Recession Is Reinforced by Slump In a Second Quarter
